      • jooqConfiguration

        @EachBean(javax.sql.DataSource.class)
public Configuration jooqConfiguration​(@Parameter
                                       String name,
                                       DataSource dataSource,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       TransactionProvider transactionProvider,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       Settings settings,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       ExecutorProvider executorProvider,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       RecordMapperProvider recordMapperProvider,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       RecordUnmapperProvider recordUnmapperProvider,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       MetaProvider metaProvider,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       ConverterProvider converterProvider,
                                       @Parameter @Nullable
                                       ConnectionProvider connectionProvider,
                                       io.micronaut.context.ApplicationContext ctx)
        Creates jOOQ Configuration. It will configure it with available jOOQ provider beans with the same qualifier.
        Parameters:
        name - The data source name
        dataSource - The DataSource
        transactionProvider - The transaction provider
        settings - The settings
        executorProvider - The executor provider
        recordMapperProvider - The record mapper provider
        recordUnmapperProvider - The record unmapper provider
        metaProvider - The metadata provider
        converterProvider - The converter provider
        connectionProvider - The connection provider
        ctx - The ApplicationContext
        Returns:
        A Configuration

      • dslContext

        @EachBean(org.jooq.Configuration.class)
public DSLContext dslContext​(Configuration configuration)
        Created DSLContext based on Configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The Configuration
        Returns:
        A DSLContext
